text: Sarah Christine Thyre (born July 9, 1968) is an American actress and writer. She is best known for her role as Mary Frances Gibbons on The Mighty B!., retrieved 2009-08-29 She was married to Andy Richter. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Stanislaus County, California Category:People from Modesto, California
title: Sarah Thyre
